definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
muscle/tendon/veins visible under the skin/sth resembling tendons or veins (e.g. fiber in a vegetable)

sentences.english: There is a positive correlativity of the content of wet gluten and stable time of dough to the yield.
sentences.chinese: 湿面筋含量和面团稳定时间与强筋小麦产量呈正相关。

sentences.english: Gluten has a better texture when it is cold, so it is better to store it in a cool place.
sentences.chinese: 面筋是越凉越有劲道，所以最好存放在阴凉的地方。

sentences.english: The higher the volume of the sedimented gluten, the better should be the baking quality of the flour.
sentences.chinese: 沉积的面筋量越多，该面粉的焙烤特性截止好。

sentences.english: Wheat gluten, whether or not dried.
The presence of gluten or lactose should clearly be mentioned on the label.
sentences.chinese: 在面筋或乳糖存在应清楚地提及在标签上。

sentences.english: People with celiac disease cannot process gluten.
sentences.chinese: 患有腹腔疾病的人不能消化面筋。

sentences.english: Edible packing films were prepared with wheat gluten.
sentences.chinese: 以小麦面筋蛋白为原料，制备可食用包装膜。

sentences.english: Absolute avoidance of glutens and dairy.
sentences.chinese: 绝对避免面筋和奶制品。

sentences.english: What is gluten and what is an allergic reaction to it.
sentences.chinese: 什么是面筋和什么是过敏性反应。

sentences.english: And the gluten quantity had the same curve in shape but increasing continuously.
sentences.chinese: 面筋的数量呈现不断增加的凸性曲线变化规律。

sentences.english: Some cases of the arthritis respond to a gluten-free diet.
sentences.chinese: 关节炎的一些病例对于没有面筋的饮食是有反应的。

sentences.english: No nut oils, gluten, soy, oat or dairy.
sentences.chinese: 无果油，面筋，大豆，燕麦或奶制品。

sentences.english: I. S. P. , Gluten, Starch, Vegetable Oil, Vegetable Seasoning.
sentences.chinese: 大豆蛋白，面筋，淀粉，植物油，素食调味料。

definition: tofu skin (made by drying the skin that forms on the surface of soymilk during cooking, and therefore not actually made from tofu)
vermicelli made from mung bean starch etc
